Text: Wow , thanks a lot mate , I really needed some of these worspress themes

For those who don't know how to upload:

1) Download themes
2) Extract the wanted theme folder to your desktop
3) Find the folder the contains just the theme files
4) Move this folder to your wp-installation at wp-content/themes (via FTP) (Or create a zip file of that folder (the one with just the themes in it) and then use the wordpress installation function)
You are a big bowl of awesome, thx!

This is amazing. However, any chance of a how to guide? Trying to figure it out without support isn't going so well.

I figured out the tooltip shortcode, but there's supposed to be a gallery shortcode too? Can't figure that one out.
